entrance.title: Reading Room
entrance.description: You are standing in a reading room. There are some desks and chairs on soft carpeted floor. There is a leaflet on the counter. There is a door behind a counter to the North.

items.name: Leaflet
items.description: Tate Archive collects and makes accessible a wealth of material primarily relating to the history of British art from 1900 to the present.

corridor1.title: Corridor
corridor1.description: What a corridor. There are doors to the South and the East.

store1.title: Store 1
store1.description: You're in a vast storage room lit by neon tubes. There is a row of 14 red shelves mounted on steel tracks embedded into the floor. Each shelf has a label and a circular handle attached to the side facing you. You hear a humming noise from the climate control system.

cantGoThatWay: You can't go in that direction
